titlestmt.titleproper: Ervin F. Bickley, Jr., family histories of the Felton family 1962-1963
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Ervin F. Bickley, Jr., family histories of the Felton family
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two binders of Felton family histories. One binder provides information on "Georg? Veltin, 1625-1680, etc." and the other on "Johann Philipp Veltin/John Philip Felton, Sr. (1758-1825) & Descendants." The histories include datasheets on different family members, photocopies of photos and some original documents, and narrative.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
